title: 北京的香山让人如临仙境

conversations.english: Do you know how to go to the Fragrant Hills in Beijing? I heard that they are very famous in China.
conversations.chinese: 你知道怎么去北京的香山吗？我听说它在中国非常有名。
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Especially in autumn, the red leaves of the maple trees make the whole mountain red.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没错，特别是在秋天，红色的枫叶把整座山都染成红色的了。

title: 给我讲讲巴黎的情况

conversations.english: Can you tell me a little about Paris?
conversations.chinese: 能给我讲点巴黎的情况吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure. What do you expect to know?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题。你想知道什么？

title: 带你们去看看民间收藏品

conversations.english: Tomorrow I'll take you to some places that I'm sure you will have interest in.
conversations.chinese: 明天我想带你们到几个地方去看看，我肯定你们会感兴趣的。
conversations.reply_english: Where else haven't we been to yet?
conversations.reply_chinese: 还有什么有趣的地方我们没去过？

title: 伦敦和上海2个城市比较

conversations.english: How’s your trip going?
conversations.chinese: 你的旅行进行的怎么样了？
conversations.reply_english: Oh I’m enjoying myself but it’s so hot here
conversations.reply_chinese: 我玩得非常开心，不过这里的天气太热了。

title: 这城市什么出名

conversations.english: What's this city famous for ?
conversations.chinese: 这城市什么出名？
conversations.reply_english: Tea and silk.
conversations.reply_chinese: 茶和丝绸。

title: 我要跟导游在山里观光

conversations.english: I'm going on a guided tour in the mountain.
conversations.chinese: 我要跟导游在山里观光。
conversations.reply_english: You'll see the world-famous magnificent waterfall.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你会看到世界著名，壮观的大瀑布。

title: 我的朋友生病了

conversations.english: Excuse me Miss, my friend is sick.
conversations.chinese: 小姐，打扰了，我的朋友生病了。
conversations.reply_english: Is he? Yes. He looks pale, is there anything I can do for him?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是他吗？是的。他看起来脸上苍白，有什么我可以帮忙的吗？

title: 回家时迷路了该怎么办

conversations.english: Well, I'm glad you're finally back. I was wondering what happened.
conversations.chinese: 很高兴你终于回来了。我还在想发生了什么事。
conversations.reply_english: I feel kind of stupid.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得我好笨。

title: 环球影城好玩吗 Universal Studios

conversations.english: I hope the food here is good.
conversations.chinese: 希望这里有好吃的。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, it is very expensive. Maybe we shouldn't have come here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，好贵，也许不该来的。

title: 我从来就不喜欢玩鬼屋

conversations.english: Alice, it really was great.I think it was the most interesting thing here. You really should go in.
conversations.chinese: 爱丽丝，真的好好玩。我觉得这里最有趣的就是鬼屋了，你真的要去玩玩看。
conversations.reply_english: No, I don't want to.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我才不想。

title: 也许我可以自己去鬼屋玩

conversations.english: It sure is hot. Why don't we go in the Haunted House?At least it will be air conditioned.
conversations.chinese: 好热喔！我们去玩鬼屋如何？至少里面有空调。
conversations.reply_english: I've told you a thousand times. I don't want to go in the Haunted House.It's too scary!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我告诉过你好几次了，我不想玩鬼屋。那太恐怖了。

title: 参观白宫 The White House

conversations.english: But it's the White House. The president and his family live there.They won't let us see most of it. Probably we can only see a couple of rooms.
conversations.chinese: 白宫是总统和他的家人住的地方。他们很多地方不会让人参观的，或许只能参观几间展览室而已。
conversations.reply_english: No, that's not true.The White House is very big. And there are a lot of historical exhibits there.The tour will take us through many different rooms. I read about it in the guide.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是这样。白宫很大，有很多历史文物。导游人员会带我们参观各个展览室，旅游指南上有说到。

title: 我们要买门票吗 Do we need tickets

conversations.english: So, what do you plan to do today?
conversations.chinese: 你们今天打算做什么？
conversations.reply_english: There is a Matisse exhibition at the Museum of Modern Art. Larry and I will go.
conversations.reply_chinese: 现代艺术博物馆现在展出法国画家马蒂斯的作品，赖瑞和我想去看看。

title: 选择探险旅游项目 Adventure Tours

conversations.english: Welcome to Adventure Tours . How may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 欢迎来到“探险旅游”。您需要什么服务？
conversations.reply_english: I want to book a tour with adventure sports.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想预定一个带有冒险运动的旅游。

title: 美术馆内禁止拍照

conversations.english: Excuse me.In this museum,you are not supposed to take pictures.
conversations.chinese: 对不起，在美术馆内，你不可以照相。
conversations.reply_english: Is that right?I didn't know it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是那样吗？我不知道。

title: 我们去参观博物馆还是白宫

conversations.english: I'm glad I brought my jacket on this trip.
conversations.chinese: 还好这趟行程我有带夹克来。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I didn't know Washington, DC got so cold in winter.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，我不知道华盛顿特区的冬天这么冷。

title: 观光自由女神像 The Statue of Liberty

conversations.english: Some places aren't good to go.But I can show you the right bus to take. It will be no problem.
conversations.chinese: 有些地方最好不要去。但是我可以告诉你搭什么公车，不会有问题的。
conversations.reply_english: We want to see the Statue of Liberty too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们也想看自由女神像。

title: 参观古代中国馆文物

conversations.english: May, is this the Hall of Ancient China?
conversations.chinese: 阿美，这是古代中国馆吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Look at these historical relics here, amazing!
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊。看这些历史遗址，真令人惊叹！

title: 我想去黄石公园 Yellow Stone Park

conversations.english: What would you be doing in U.S.A?
conversations.chinese: 你到美国后要干什么？
conversations.reply_english: Most of the time I'll be on a tour,enjoying the beautiful scenery there.
conversations.reply_chinese: 大多数时间是去观光.观赏那里的美丽风光。

title: 在旅行社咨询蜜月旅行

conversations.english: Welcome to Perfect Getaway Tours. How can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 欢迎来到Perfect Getaway Tours，您需要什么服务？
conversations.reply_english: I would like to plan a surprise getaway for me and my wife.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想为我和妻子寻找一个神奇的地方。

title: 介绍观光信息的小册子在哪

conversations.english: Excuse me.
conversations.chinese: 打扰一下。
conversations.reply_english: Yes?
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么事？

title: 你能告诉我玉佛寺怎么走吗

conversations.english: Do you speak English?
conversations.chinese: 你会说英语吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, a little.
conversations.reply_chinese: 会一点。

title: 观光故宫博物馆 The Forbidden City

conversations.english: Uncle Ben, how did the Forbidden City get this name?
conversations.chinese: 本叔叔，紫禁城这个名字是怎么来的啊？
conversations.reply_english: Well, in the feudal society, emperors had supreme power, so his residence was certainly a forbidden palace.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这个嘛，在封建社会，帝王拥有至高无上的权利，那他的住处当然是禁地啦。

title: 奥运公园是个伟大的工程

conversations.english: This Olympic park is so big!
conversations.chinese: 这个奥运公园可真大啊！
conversations.reply_english: Yes. Now we are in the Olympic stadium, the center of this park.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，我们现在在奥运体育场，公园的中心。

title: 中国古代的四大发明

conversations.english: There are so many people that the tickets are all sold out!
conversations.chinese: 人太多了，票都卖完了。
conversations.reply_english: Luckily we got the last two.
conversations.reply_chinese: 幸好我们买了最后两张。

title: 我觉得做导游不错

conversations.english: I think it might be a good idea to work as a guide.
conversations.chinese: 我觉得做导游不错。
conversations.reply_english: Where do you intend to go?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你要去哪儿？

title: 最好的参观游览处是哪里

conversations.english: What are the best places to visit here please?
conversations.chinese: 请问这里最好的参观游览处是哪里?
conversations.reply_english: It depends If you are interested in the city.You might like to tour it by car I can be your guide,We'll leave the afternoon free.You can do some shopping in the mall if you like.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那要视情况而定假如你们对城市有兴趣.喜欢坐小汽车环游我可以当你们的向导,我们把下午空出来.你们愿意的话不妨去购物城买买东西.

title: 我想去美国旅游度假

conversations.english: Welcome, sir. May I help you?
conversations.chinese: 先生，欢迎你。有什么我可以帮你吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I wanna go to America for my vacation.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想去美国度假。
